column5: Information systems offer opportunities for enterprises and for people to communicate, learn, innovate and organize.This programme gives advanced and broad knowledge of the planning, design and use of information systems in organisations and businesses.It will also prepare for research studies within informatics. The aim is to give each student the competence needed to describe and analyse businesses, organisations and their need for developing information systems.
column7: Tuition fees, first payment: 73,000 SEK  Tuition fees, total: 146,000 SEK
